languages.text: {n}Кассия виновато хмурится.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан. Я была уверена, что это — святая традиция, скрепленная древними обетами повиновения... Вероятно, это не первый сюрприз, что ожидает меня за стенами Эурак-V".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия виновато хмурится.{/n} "Прошу меня простить. Я не желала оскорбить Вольного Торговца".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия виновато хмурится.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан. Я была уверена, что это — святая традиция, скрепленная древними обетами повиновения... Вероятно, это не первый сюрприз, что ожидает меня за стенами Эурак-V".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it is a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the sheltering walls of Eurac-V."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it is a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the sheltering walls of Eurac-V."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅愧疚地皱起了眉。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我本以为这是个神圣的传统，受古老的誓言约束，是神圣不可侵犯的惯例……看来，在欧拉克五号星站的高墙之外，还有更多令人吃惊的事情在等着我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅愧疚地皱起了眉。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我本以为这是个神圣的传统，受古老的誓言约束，是神圣不可侵犯的惯例……看来，在欧拉克五号星的高墙之外，还有更多令人吃惊的事情在等着我。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

languages.text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, culpable.{/n} «Lo lamento, Lord Capitán. Estaba segura de que era una tradición sagrada, santificada por antiguos votos de obediencia... Imagino que me llevaré muchas más sorpresas fuera de los muros de Eurac V».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, culpable.{/n} «Lo lamento, Lord Capitán. Estaba segura de que era una tradición sagrada, santificada por antiguos votos de obediencia... Imagino que me llevaré muchas más sorpresas fuera de los muros de Eurac-V».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは後ろめたそうに顔をしかめた。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私はそれを、古くからの服従の誓いによって神聖化された伝統だと信じていたのですが…ユーラック・Vの壁の外では、さらなる驚きが私を待っているのでしょうね」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは後ろめたそうに顔をしかめた。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私はそれを、古くからの服従の誓いによって神聖化された伝統だと信じていたのですが…ユーラック・Vの壁の外では、さらなる驚きが私を待っているのでしょうね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia runzelt schuldbewusst die Stirn.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, Lord Captain. Ich war mir sicher, es war eine heilige Tradition, unantastbar gemacht durch die uralten Gelübde des Gehorsams ... Ich gehe davon aus, dass mich außerhalb der Wände von Eurac V weitere Überraschungen erwarten."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia runzelt schuldbewusst die Stirn.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, Lord Captain. Ich war mir sicher, es war eine heilige Tradition, unantastbar gemacht durch die uralten Gelübde des Gehorsams ... Ich gehe davon aus, dass mich außerhalb der Wände von Eurac-V weitere Überraschungen erwarten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils d'un air coupable.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il me semblait qu'il s'agissait là d'une tradition sacrosainte imposée par les anciens vœux d'obéissance... J'imagine que j'ai encore bien des choses à découvrir en dehors d'Eurac-V. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils d'un air coupable.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il me semblait qu'il s'agissait là d'une tradition sacrosainte imposée par les anciens vœux d'obéissance... J'imagine que j'ai encore bien des choses à découvrir en dehors d'Eurac-V. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia suçlulukla somurtuyor.{/n} "Lütfen affet Lord Kaptan. Bunun, kadim sessizlik yeminlerinin gerektirdiği kutsal bir gelenek olduğundan emindim. Galiba Eurac V'in ötesinde beni daha nice sürprizler bekliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns guiltily.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain. I was sure it was a sacred tradition made sacrosanct by the ancient vows of obedience... I expect more surprises will be waiting for me outside the walls of Eurac V."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia suçlulukla somurtuyor.{/n} "Lütfen affet Lord Kaptan. Bunun, kadim sessizlik yeminlerinin gerektirdiği kutsal bir gelenek olduğundan emindim... Herhâlde Eurac V'in ötesinde beni bekleyen daha pek çok sürpriz vardır."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
